author: Freddy Bird
method: Drain and rinse the chickpeas and place in a bowl. Add the cucumber, herbs, chilli and red onion.  Gently toss to combine. Season with lemon juice, salt and pepper, to taste.
ingredients: 1 x 400g/14oz tin chickpeas,  1 cucumber, seeds removed, chopped into 1cm/Â½in cubes,  1 bunch coriander, leaves picked,  1 bunch parsley, leaves picked,  1 green chilli, finely chopped,  1 red onion, finely chopped,  lemon juice, to taste,  salt and pepper
